articles.description: Jofra Archer takes two wickets in his first international for more than a year as England begin their World Cup preparations with a 23-run victory over Pakistan in the second T20 at Edgbaston.
articles.title: England v Pakistan T20 international: Jofra Archer takes two wickets as hosts win at Edgbaston

articles.description: Toulouse's Thomas Ramos kicks three extra-time penalties to help edge out Leinster in a pulsating Investec Champions Cup final at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium.
articles.title: Investec Champions Cup final: Toulouse 31-22  Leinster - French giants win thriller

articles.description: Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc takes pole position for the Monaco Grand Prix from McLaren’s Oscar Piastri.
articles.title: Charles Leclerc takes Monaco Grand Prix pole

articles.title: Wayne Rooney: Plymouth Argyle appoint former England captain as head coach

articles.description: Rafael Nadal still cannot say "100%" if he is playing the French Open for a final time - but it remains a "big chance" it will be.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal not "100%" sure if this will be his last at Roland Garros
